meanings.definition: A small, enclosed space used for heating or cooking food.
meanings.sent1: We cooked our dinner in the hotboxes at the campsite.
meanings.sent2: The chef placed the pastries in the hotboxes to keep them warm.
meanings.sent3: The hotboxes in the kitchen were so tiny, it felt like a cooking challenge!
meanings.sent4: The hotboxes transformed the raw ingredients into a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the hotboxes.

meanings.definition: To cook food in a hotbox.
meanings.sent1: She hotboxes her meals to keep them warm for later.
meanings.sent2: The caterer hotboxes the dishes before serving them at the event.
meanings.sent3: He hotboxes his lunch every day, claiming it tastes better that way.
meanings.sent4: Hotboxing the food ensures it stays at the perfect temperature.
meanings.sent5: Hotboxing the stew made it taste even more flavorful.

meanings.definition: A method of smoking marijuana in a confined space to intensify the effects.
meanings.sent1: The teenagers used hotboxes to enhance their smoking experience.
meanings.sent2: Hotboxes are popular among some marijuana users for a stronger high.
meanings.sent3: The hotboxes in the basement turned it into a hazy paradise.
meanings.sent4: The hotboxes created a cloud of smoke that enveloped the room.
meanings.sent5: The hotboxes made the marijuana hit harder than usual.
